short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you don't like Newgrounds background art, this extension is for you!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Removes Newgrounds background art when the site is loaded as fast as possible

Report bugs at https://xytriza.com/ng-background-remover/bugs
